feed.title: Newark AI Community Town Hall
feed.subtitle: Empowering Newark residents with AI knowledge through free town halls, training sessions, and community support.

entry.title: AI and Your Privacy: What You Need to Know
entry.content: A straightforward guide to protecting your privacy when using AI tools. Learn what data is collected, how it's used, and simple steps to stay safe.

entry.title: How AI Can Help Your Small Business Save Time and Money
entry.content: Discover free AI tools that can help your Newark small business with marketing, customer service, bookkeeping, and more—no tech skills required.

entry.title: What is AI? A Simple Explanation for Newark Residents
entry.content: Artificial intelligence doesn't have to be complicated. Learn what AI really is, how it works, and why it matters to you—explained in plain English without the tech jargon.
